name: Control Switch (mxdirector)
description:
This is my entry in to the GMTK 2021 game jam.
I have taken the theme as joining together the controls of a standard fps game.

The goal of the game is to shoot the robots to earn an high score while being kept on the edge of your seat with the ever changing control scheme.

Every 20 seconds, the controls of shoot will be switched with other random keys or mouse movements, meaning you will have to constantly adapt to the game.

Controls:

WASD : to move

Mouse: to look

Space: jump

Press Q to view current controls layout.

Shoot will randomly change.

Known issues:

there are some issues with the jump and certain areas, so I had to change it so that the jump is not included. However this is still causing troubles, so I'll have to revisiting how the groundcheck is being performed.
